companies.name: Vivici
companies.reason: This Dutch startup focuses on producing dairy proteins through precision fermentation and recently secured $37 million in funding to advance its product offerings in the health sector.

companies.name: Hinge Health
companies.reason: Recognized as a leading digital clinic, Hinge Health is notable for delivering advanced treatment solutions for musculoskeletal disorders and mental health.

companies.name: DispatchHealth
companies.reason: This company is transforming healthcare delivery by providing at-home urgent care, which allows patients to receive necessary medical assistance in a familiar environment.
